content: PTC Express: Comparing Two Versions of the Same Part with Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire 2.0 and Pro/INTRALINK 3.4

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span span
html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font b span span
content: Comparing Two Versions of the Same Part with Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire 2.0 and Pro/INTRALINK 3.4

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font em span span
content: by Victor Gerdes, PTC Senior Product Manager

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: Pro/INTRALINK can accurately track changes to Pro/ENGINEER files including the version, revision, and lifecycle, but cannot capture the types of changes within the Pro/ENGINEER model files.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: For example, there may be meta-data, geometry, drawing, or cosmetic changes between two file versions that is not tracked at all. To determine the difference between two Pro/ENGINEER file versions, you can either manually compare the Pro/ENGINEER models or ask the designer who made the changes to point out the differences between the two models.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: Both of these methods are time consuming and risky.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire 2.0 has the ability to compare two part files and

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: provide a fast, precise, error-free report

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: Part comparison and difference reporting allow you to understand

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span span
html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: what has changed between two Pro/ENGINEER part files.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: What’s more, with Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire 2.0 and Pro/INTRALINK 3.4, you can achieve even better part comparison and difference-reporting to highlight and detail the differences between two parts.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font ul li span span
content: A part from a Workspace with a part in the Commonspace

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font ul li span span
content: A part from disk with a part in the Commonspace

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font ul li span span
content: A part from a Workspace with a part from disk

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: You can also compare two versions of the same part or two different parts.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: When you compare two versions of the same part, it is necessary to enter a replacement name when opening the comparison part, since Pro/ENGINEER does not allow two models with the same name in session.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span

content: If you want to compare an earlier version of a part with the latest version of the part, you must first retrieve the earlier version into Pro/ENGINEER as your base model.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: Then you can retrieve the latest version of the model for comparison.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p font font strong span
html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p font font span
content: Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire part difference analysis currently supports comparing two parts. Comparison of assemblies, drawings, and family tables is not supported with Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire 2.0 but is planned to be available with the next release of Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: When choosing the comparison model, Pro/ENGINEER Wildfire will retrieve the latest version of the selected file.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span font p span span
content: This is useful when trying to identify the changes you made to a model that you checked out and worked on in Pro/ENGINEER.
